title: China to actively promote int'l sci-tech cooperation
content:
Panoramic photo taken on Jan. 8, 2020 shows China's Five-hundred-meter Aperture Spherical radio Telescope (FAST) under maintenance in southwest China's Guizhou Province. 
BEIJING, March 5 (Xinhua) -- China will actively promote international cooperation on science and technology, and support the establishment of international sci-tech organizations in the country, according to the draft outline of the 14th Five-Year Plan (2021-2025) for national economic and social development and the long-range objectives through the year 2035, which was unveiled on Friday.
